title: Cheddar and spring onion scones
ingredients: ['250g self-raising flour, plus more for kneading', '1/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '100g very cold butter, cut into pieces', '180ml buttermilk, plus additional for brushing', '55g grated Irish Cheddar cheese, divided, plus more for topping', '25g sliced spring onions, divided']
